indian.details: VFTF (96h) only valid if holding valid US/UK/Aus/Schengen visa AND traveling to/from that country. Else E-Visa needed.

activities.title: Jewel Rain Vortex
activities.description: World's tallest indoor waterfall inside the airport (Landside). Light show at night.

activities.title: Marina Bay Sands Skypark
activities.description: Iconic rooftop views of the skyline and F1 track. Requires taxi/MRT to city.

activities.title: Gardens by the Bay
activities.description: Avatar-like Supertrees and Cloud Forest dome. Must see.

activities.title: Lau Pa Sat Hawker Centre
activities.description: Famous historic market for Satay street and Laksa. Great vibe at night.

activities.title: Butterfly Garden T3
activities.description: Peaceful garden with 1000 butterflies inside Transit area.

activities.title: Free Singapore Tour
activities.description: Official free bus tour for transit passengers (2.5h). Register at booths in T2/T3.

activities.title: Ambassador Transit Hotel
activities.description: Airside hotel in T2/T3. Book 6-hour blocks.

activities.title: Chinatown & Buddha Tooth Relic
activities.description: Historic temple and bustling streets with cheap Michelin food.
